meanings.definition: To provide a spoken description or analysis of an event or performance.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys commentating on sports events for the radio.
meanings.sent2: The announcer is commentating on the soccer match live.
meanings.sent3: While commentating on the race, he accidentally mixed up the names of the runners.
meanings.sent4: Her voice commentating on the play was like a guiding light for the audience.
meanings.sent5: The commentator's energetic commentating made the game even more exciting.

meanings.definition: To offer an opinion or remark on a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: He is always commentating on the latest political news.
meanings.sent2: During the meeting, everyone had a chance to commentate on the proposed changes.
meanings.sent3: She couldn't help but commentate on the delicious aroma coming from the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: His comments were like a sharp sword, commentating on the flaws in the plan.
meanings.sent5: The teacher encouraged the students to commentate on the book they had read.
